name: Best Friends - My Horse 3D
description:
You and your horse – a winning team in fantastic 3D!
Care for your own horse with overwhelming 3D effects! Give it all your tender love and take part in exciting tournaments.

- Create your own dream horse and choose from breeds like Friesian, Andalusian and Arabian

- Take the reins and ride on your horse by using the amazing gyroscope controls

- Show your skills on 10 show jumping courses and try to master all obstacles with the right timing

- Lovingly groom your horse, massage it, hose it down, feed it and clean its hooves

- Breed cute foals by choosing the parents – cart horse, crossbred horse or thoroughbred

- Train your foals in the riding hall and reward them with carrots from your garden

- Buy numerous accessories, place them on your horse and participate in glamorous beauty contests

- Create your perfect horse with the editor including all breeds and accessories

- StreetPass™: Breed virtually with other players

- Collect Play Coins and hire somebody to complete tasks for you

- Photo feature: Take a photo of yourself for your profile
